vibesExplanation: The workout video 'Regulate Your Nervous System | 15 Minute Yoga Practice' is best classified with the vibes 'The Zen Flow' and 'The Deep Recharge'. The title and description emphasize a calming, breath-centered approach, suitable for grounding and intentional practice, aligning with 'Zen Flow.' The description focuses on soothing the parasympathetic nervous system and nurturing a state of "rest and digest," which is indicative of 'The Deep Recharge.' Comments highlight the calming and reset effect of the practice, reinforcing these vibes. The score for 'The Zen Flow' is 0.9 due to strong emphasis on breath awareness and grounding, while 'The Deep Recharge' scores 0.8 as it underpins a relaxing and reset agenda. Other vibes were excluded due to lack of intensity and energetic elements characteristic of those categories.
